name: dankCastle
description:
I have been busy, however I made a bit of time for this years 7dFPS compo. More like a day and a half FPS in this case but still interesting.

http://jph_wacheski.itch.io/

Control: WASD and mouse. [ ARROW keys as well ]

LMB to Fire, RMB to Zoom, [ MMB to fly, perhaps just for dev. ]

If you remove all moving targets you win the game.

dankCastle_025.zip is the entry.

Wall collisions are not implemented, so just avoid the walls,. would have been next on my todo list, alas,. time ran out. I will release more updates as free time permits. Thanks for looking.

inspired by 7dFPS 2014

build with ZGameEditor

sound SunVox modular tracker

iterationGAMES/jph wacheski 2014

UPDATE; now at 51, still no walls ;)
